tags.string: A card has a default slot. To organize a card, you can provide a header and footer argument, as well as content for those slots.
tags.html: A card has a default slot. To organize a card, you can provide a header and footer argument, as well as content for those slots.

tags.string:
aire-card(default)
 .uk-card-body Card content in a slot

aire-card(header default)
 p(slot="header") A header
 .uk-card-body Card content in a slot
tags.html:
aire-card(header default)
p(slot="header") A header
.uk-card-body Card content in a slot

tags.string:
aire-card(footer default)
 .uk-card-body Card content in a slot
 p(slot="footer") A footer
tags.html:
aire-card(footer default)
.uk-card-body Card content in a slot
p(slot="footer") A footer

tags.string: Cards can be styled by passing a `default`, `primary`, `secondary` or `hover` argument.
tags.html: Cards can be styled by passing a default, primary, secondary or hover argument.

tags.string:
.uk-child-width-1-4.uk-grid
 aire-card(default)
     .uk-card-body Default
 aire-card(primary)
     .uk-card-body Primary
 aire-card(secondary)
     .uk-card-body Secondary
 aire-card(hover)
     .uk-card-body Hover
tags.html:
.uk-child-width-1-4.uk-grid
aire-card(default)
.uk-card-body Default
aire-card(primary)
.uk-card-body Primary
aire-card(secondary)
.uk-card-body Secondary
aire-card(hover)
.uk-card-body Hover

tags.string: To adjust the amount of padding a card has, use `padding-small`, `padding` and `padding-large` -- by default, a card has no padding.
tags.html: To adjust the amount of padding a card has, use padding-small, padding and padding-large -- by default, a card has no padding.

tags.string:
.uk-child-width-1-3.uk-grid
 aire-card(padding-small default)
     | A card with small padding
 aire-card(padding default)
     | A card with normal padding
 aire-card(padding-large default)
     | A card with large padding
tags.html:
.uk-child-width-1-3.uk-grid
aire-card(padding-small default)
| A card with small padding
aire-card(padding default)
| A card with normal padding
aire-card(padding-large default)
| A card with large padding

description.full: A card is a layout box that can have different styles and include a header and footer.
description.summary: A card is a layout box that can have different styles and include a header and footer.
